revised_title: The Mechanism of Heat Production in Mammalian Muscle Rigor
tldr: This study investigates the heat production in mammalian muscle rigor using a rabbit model. The researchers compared the rate of heat production with the rate of muscle stiffening and plasma gelation. They found that the heat production is not due to a simple chemical reaction, but rather a complex process involving multiple changes within the muscle fibers.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Muscle Physiology
